text: SUPINFO International University, formerly called "École Supérieure d'Informatique", is a renowned graduate engineering school in France. It is in a campus of IONIS Education Group.Ionis Group retenu pour racheter Supinfo It has been created in 1965. The school is recognized by the French State since 1972.Décret du 10 janvier 1972 PORTANT RECONNAISSANCE PAR L'ETAT DE L'ECOLE SUPERIEURE D'INFORMATIQUE SISE 44, RUE DE RENNES, PARIS (6E) It offers a 5-year course in IT. == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in Paris Category:1965 establishments in France
title: Supinfo
